00006 #define NUM_SONARS 16   // With great consternation, I resort to an ugly define for efficiency's
00007                                                 // sake; utilization within SonarReading resulted in a gain of ~30ms per 
00008                                                 // 700 readings.

00026 class Coord
00027 {
00028 public:
00029 
00031         int x;
00032 
00034         int y;
00035 
00037         Coord( int x_ = 0, int y_ = 0 ) : x( x_ ), y( y_ ) {}
00038 
00042         Coord& scale( const double factor );
00043 
00047         Coord scaled( const double factor ) { 
00048                 Coord c(*this); return c.scale( factor ); 
00049         }
00050 
00055         Coord operator-( const Coord& subtrahend ) const;
00056 
00061         Coord operator+( const Coord& addend ) const;
00062 
00066         Coord& operator=( const Coord& coord ) { 
00067                 this->x = coord.x; this->y = coord.y; return *this; 
00068         }
00069 
00073         Coord& operator+=( const Coord& addend ) { 
00074                 this->x += addend.x; this->y += addend.y; return *this; 
00075         }
00076 
00080         Coord& operator-=( const Coord& subtrahend ) { 
00081                 this->x -= subtrahend.x; this->y -= subtrahend.y; return *this; 
00082         }
00083 
00087         bool operator==( const Coord& coord ) const {
00088                 return x == coord.x && y == coord.y;
00089         }
00090 
00095         bool operator!=( const Coord& coord ) const {
00096                 return x != coord.x || y != coord.y;
00097         }
00098 
00103         Coord mappedTo( double th, double d ) const;
00104 
00109         void mapTo( double th, double d );
00110 
00115         Coord rotatedBy( double th, Coord pivot = Coord() ) const;
00116 
00121         void rotateBy( double th, Coord pivot = Coord() );
00122 
00124         double distanceTo( const Coord& coord ) const;
00125 
00127         double distanceFrom( const Coord& coord ) const { return distanceTo( coord ); }
00128 
00133         double angleTo( const Coord& coord ) const;
00134 
00139         double angleFrom( const Coord& coord ) const { return coord.angleTo( *this ); }
00140 
00142         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Coord& coord );
00143 };

00150 struct BoundBox
00151 {
00153         Coord ul;
00154 
00156         Coord lr;
00157 
00159         BoundBox( int ulX = 0, int ulY = 0, int lrX = 0, int lrY = 0 )
00160                 : ul( ulX, ulY ), lr( lrX, lrY ) {}
00161 
00163         BoundBox( Coord ul_, Coord lr_ )
00164                 : ul( ul_ ), lr( lr_ ) {}
00165 
00167         int width() const { return abs( ul.x - lr.x ) + 1; }
00168 
00170         int height() const { return abs( ul.y - lr.y ) + 1; }
00171 
00173         bool contains( const Coord& point ) const;
00174 
00176         BoundBox& unionWith( const BoundBox& box );
00177 
00179         BoundBox& intersectWith( const BoundBox& box );
00180 
00182         BoundBox& expandBy( int n, int s, int e, int w );
00183 
00188         BoundBox operator-( const BoundBox& subtrahend ) const;
00189 
00194         BoundBox operator+( const BoundBox& addend ) const;
00195 
00197         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const BoundBox& box );
00198 };

00205 struct Pose
00206 {
00208         Coord coord;
00209 
00211         double theta;
00212 
00214         Pose( Coord c = Coord(), double t = 0.0 ) : coord(c), theta(t) {}
00215 
00217         Pose( int x, int y, double t = 0.0 ) : coord(x, y), theta(t) {}
00218 
00222         Pose& scale( const double factor ) { coord.scale( factor ); return *this; }
00223 
00227         Pose scaled( const double factor ) const { Pose p(*this); return p.scale( factor ); }
00228 
00234         Pose operator-( const Pose& subtrahend ) const;
00235 
00241         Pose operator+( const Pose& addend ) const;
00242 
00246         Pose& operator=( const Pose& pose ) { coord = pose.coord; theta = pose.theta; return *this; }
00247 
00251         Pose& operator+=( const Pose& addend ) { *this = *this + addend; return *this; }
00252 
00256         Pose& operator-=( const Pose& addend ) { *this = *this - addend; return *this; }
00257 
00261         bool operator==( const Pose& pose ) const { 
00262                 return coord == pose.coord && theta == pose.theta; }
00263 
00268         bool operator!=( const Pose& pose ) const {     
00269                 return coord != pose.coord || theta != pose.theta; }
00270 
00272         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Pose& pose );
00273 };

00280 struct SonarReading
00281 {
00283         Pose robotPose;
00284 
00286         int sonarNumber;
00287 
00289         int distance;
00290 
00292         int all[NUM_SONARS];
00293 
00297         SonarReading()
00298                 : robotPose(), sonarNumber(0), distance(0) { initRanges( NULL ); }
00299 
00300 
00307         SonarReading( const Pose &p, const int *a = NULL, int s = 0 )
00308                 : robotPose(p), sonarNumber(s), distance(a==NULL?0:a[s]) { initRanges( a ); }
00309 
00310 
00315         SonarReading( ArRobot* robot );

00317 
00323         SonarReading( char *line );
00324

00329         SonarReading( const SonarReading &r );

00336         void initRanges( const int *a );
00337 
00338 
00342         SonarReading& scale( const double factor ) { 
00343                 robotPose.scale( factor ); distance = static_cast<int>(distance / factor); return *this; }
00344 
00348         SonarReading scaled( const double factor ) { SonarReading r(*this); return r.scale( factor ); }

00365 struct MappedSonarReading
00366 {
00368         SonarReading reading;
00369 
00371         Pose sonarPose;
00372 
00374         Coord objectCoord;
00375 
00380         MappedSonarReading( SonarReading r = SonarReading(), Pose s = Pose(), Coord o = Coord() )
00381                 : reading(r), sonarPose(s), objectCoord(o) {}
00382 
00386         MappedSonarReading& scale( const double factor ) { 
00387                 reading.scale( factor ); sonarPose.scale( factor ); objectCoord.scale( factor ); return *this; }
00388 
00392         MappedSonarReading scaled( const double factor ) { 
00393                 MappedSonarReading r(*this); return r.scale( factor ); }
00394 
00396         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const MappedSonarReading& r );
00397 };
